static ReceiptLib::setDrawerKick (  )  [static]

Check whether drawer should open on this transaction

Returns:
  • 1 open drawer
  • 0 do not open
Deprecated:
use Kicker modules

static ReceiptLib::setDrawerKickLater (  )  [static]

Variant check for when to open cash drawer

Returns:
  • 1 open drawer
  • 0 do not open
Opens on cash transactions, credit card transactions > $25, and stamp sales.

Deprecated:
use Kicker modules
